name: Pink Square and the Wacky Tower
name_original: Pink Square and the Wacky Tower
description:
Yes, this is video game

You play as the Pink Square and you must go up the Wacky Tower. (or something)

2 Campaigns: Regular and EX (EX is half the length of the Regular campaign, but its harder.)

A boss rush which includes its own unique bosses (16 bosses in total)

Boss practice mode: you can practice any of the bosses in the game

Different difficulty settings!

Classic: 3 health, has lives system

Normal: 3 health, no lives system

Baby Mode: 9 health, no lives system

1 Hit Mode: If you get hit you restart

2 Extra Features

Speedrun Clock: Enable to have a speedrun clock

Orange: Play as Orange square, aim with mouse and click to attack, your attacks don't despawn

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move, Z to attack

Orange Mode: Mouse to aim, Click to attack

R to restart
